org.grouplens.lenskit.baseline

Class ItemMeanRatingItemScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.AbstractItemScorer
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.baseline.ItemMeanRatingItemScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ItemScorer

    @DefaultProvider(value=ItemMeanRatingItemScorer.Builder.class)
@Shareable
public class ItemMeanRatingItemScorer
extends AbstractItemScorer
implements java.io.Serializable
    Rating scorer that returns the item's mean rating for all predictions. If the item has no ratings, the global mean rating is returned. This implements the baseline scorer pu,i = µ + bi, where bi is the item's average rating (less the global mean µ).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public ItemMeanRatingItemScorer(ImmutableSparseVector itemMeans,
                        double globalMean,
                        double damping)
        Construct a new scorer. This assumes ownership of the provided map.
        Parameters:
        itemMeans - A map of item IDs to their mean ratings.
        globalMean - The mean rating value for all items.
        damping - The damping factor.

    • Method Detail

      • score

        public void score(long user,
         @Nonnull
         MutableSparseVector items)
        Description copied from interface: ItemScorer
        Score items in a vector. The key domain of the provided vector is the items to score, and the score method sets the values for each item to its score (or unsets it, if no score can be provided). The previous values are discarded.
        Specified by:
        score in interface ItemScorer
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        items - The score vector.
